title: Microsoft Teams: Join Teams work meetings from Microsoft Teams (free) and vice versa
description: This feature enables Microsoft Teams (free) users, those using a personal Microsoft Account, to directly join Teams for work meetings from within the client and stay connected even after the meeting has ended. This feature similarly also enables Microsoft Teams (work or school) users to join the Microsoft Teams (free) meetings directly from within the client.  These users are no longer prompted to join via a browser and treated as meeting guests (anonymous).
